parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "window_title",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "application": "LibreOffice Writer",
      "document_name": "Sem título 1"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_arquivo",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Arquivo",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_editar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Editar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_exibir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Exibir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_inserir",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Inserir",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formatar",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formatar",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_estilos",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_tabela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Tabela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_formulario",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Formulário",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ferramentas",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ferramentas",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_janela",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Janela",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_ajuda",
    "type": "menu_item",
    "text": "Ajuda",
    "region": "menu-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_new_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Novo",
    "icon": "document_new",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_open_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Abrir",
    "icon": "folder_open",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_save_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Salvar",
    "icon": "save",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print_document",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Imprimir",
    "icon": "print",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_print_preview",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Visualizar impressão",
    "icon": "print_preview",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_cut",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Recortar",
    "icon": "cut",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_copy",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Copiar",
    "icon": "copy",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_paste",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Colar",
    "icon": "paste",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_undo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Desfazer",
    "icon": "undo",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_redo",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Refazer",
    "icon": "redo",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_find_replace",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Localizar e substituir",
    "icon": "find_replace",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_paragraph_style",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Estilo de parágrafo Padrão"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_name",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "Arial",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "Arial"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_size",
    "type": "dropdown",
    "text": "12 pt",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "12 pt"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_bold",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Negrito",
    "icon": "bold",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_italic",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Itálico",
    "icon": "italic",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_underline",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sublinhado",
    "icon": "underline",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_strikethrough",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Tachado",
    "icon": "strikethrough",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_superscript",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Sobrescrito",
    "icon": "superscript",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_subscript",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Subscrito",
    "icon": "subscript",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_font_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor da fonte",
    "icon": "font_color",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_highlight_color",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Cor de realce",
    "icon": "highlight_color",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_clear_formatting",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Limpar formatação direta",
    "icon": "clear_formatting",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_left",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à esquerda",
    "icon": "align_left",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "selected"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_center",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Centralizar",
    "icon": "align_center",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_align_right",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Alinhar à direita",
    "icon": "align_right",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_justify",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Justificar",
    "icon": "justify",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_bullet_list",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Marcadores",
    "icon": "bullet_list",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_numbered_list",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Numeração",
    "icon": "numbered_list",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_decrease_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir recuo",
    "icon": "decrease_indent",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_increase_indent",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar recuo",
    "icon": "increase_indent",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_line_spacing",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Espaçamento de linha",
    "icon": "line_spacing",
    "region": "toolbar",
    "actions": ["onClick"],
    "state": "inactive"
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "horizontal",
      "units": "cm"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "document_area",
    "type": "text_editor",
    "region": "main-content",
    "text": "X\njose da silva\ndiretor",
    "meta": {
      "cursor_position": "after 'X'",
      "content_type": "text"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_properties",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Propriedades",
    "icon": "properties",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "selected",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_styles",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Estilos",
    "icon": "styles",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "inactive",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_gallery",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Galeria",
    "icon": "gallery",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "inactive",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_navigator",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Navegador",
    "icon": "navigator",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "inactive",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_shapes",
    "type": "sidebar_tab",
    "text": "Formas",
    "icon": "shapes",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "state": "inactive",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "sidebar_scroll_bar",
    "type": "scroll_bar",
    "region": "sidebar",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "vertical",
      "scroll_position": "top"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_page_count",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Página 1 de 1",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_word_count",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "0 palavra, 0 caractere",
    "region": "status-bar"
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_page_style",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Estilo de página Padrão",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_language",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "Português (Brasil)",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_out",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Diminuir zoom",
    "icon": "zoom_out",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_slider",
    "type": "slider",
    "text": "Zoom",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onChange"],
    "meta": {
      "current_value": "100%"
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_in",
    "type": "button",
    "text": "Aumentar zoom",
    "icon": "zoom_in",
    "region": "status-bar",
    "actions": ["onClick"]
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar_zoom_percentage",
    "type": "label",
    "text": "100%",
    "region": "status-bar"
  }
]
